Description: Body sherd of Chian Wild Goat Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; traces of two bands in added white; exterior: from left: uncertain motif; wide framing ornament consisting of vertical maeander pattern, dot and billet pattern and part of large maeander.
Curator's comments: For parallels, see Lemos 1991, pl. 20, no. 236 from Vulci.
Bibliographic references: Lemos 1991 / Archaic Pottery of Chios. The Decorated Styles (p. 240, no. 203)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0095) (phase 2)
